CustomField.description: If RESERVED, use Donor Note field for future plan or commitment. RECEIVED indicates acknowledgement by recipient and may require a change to Delivery Date and Quanity Field. If CANCELLED because member declined the offer, put the word Declined in the Donor Note field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If RESERVED, use Donor Note field for future plan or commitment. RECEIVED indicates acknowledgement by recipient and may require a change to Delivery Date and Quanity Field. If CANCELLED because member declined the offer, put the word Declined in the Donor Note field.
CustomField.label: Stage
